description: A Flutter widget class 'MenuResultCard' that displays a menu item result, including an image (or error message) and caption, styled to match 'Electric Orange' theme. It supports both URL and base64 images.

classes.name: MenuResultCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a card showing either a generated dish image with caption or an error message if generation failed.

methods.name: MenuResultCard
methods.description: Constructor for the MenuResultCard widget, requiring a MenuItemResult item.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the menu result card, displaying an image or error state, and a caption footer.
